Package de.thesycon.usbio

Interface Summary
PnPNotifyInterface Interface for plug and play notifications.
UsbIoErrorCodes  
UsbIoInterface  
UsbSpec  
 

Class Summary
PnPNotify Class for register plug and play notifications for a guid.
UsbIo This class implements the interface to the USBIO device driver.
UsbIoBuf This class is used as a buffer descriptor of buffers used for read and write operations.
UsbIoBufPool This class implements a pool of UsbIoBuf objects.
UsbIoPipe This class implements the interface to an USB pipe that is exported by the USBIO device driver.
UsbIoReader This class implements a worker-thread that continuously reads a data stream from a pipe.
UsbIoThread This class provides a basic implementation of a worker-thread that is used to continuously perform I/O operations.
UsbIoWriter This class implements a worker-thread that continuously writes a data stream from a pipe.
